source_caption_data.pre_caption: This time-lapse video captures a powerful thunderstorm at night. The primary motion consists of dramatic flashes of lightning that repeatedly illuminate a massive cloud formation from within, revealing its turbulent structure against a starry sky. In the distance, the dark silhouettes of mountains and the faint glow of city lights are visible on the horizon.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This time-lapse video captures a powerful thunderstorm at night. The primary motion consists of dramatic flashes of lightning that repeatedly illuminate a massive cloud formation from within, revealing its turbulent structure against a starry sky. In the distance, the dark silhouettes of mountains and the faint glow of city lights are visible on the horizon.

generated_critique: The caption should be revised to be more objective and to include a key motion that was omitted. The adjectives "powerful" and "dramatic" are subjective and should be removed. The description accurately notes the lightning illuminating the cloud from within, but it fails to mention the distinct cloud-to-ground lightning strike visible on the right side of the frame. Additionally, the introductory phrase "This time-lapse video captures..." should be deleted, and the final sentence describing the static horizon could be removed to maintain a strict focus on the motion, as per the instructions.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: Flashes of lightning repeatedly illuminate a massive cloud formation from within, revealing its turbulent structure against a starry sky. A distinct cloud-to-ground lightning strike is also visible on the right.
